title: Update
body: Hi, this is a humble request to update Narada to the latest version as the version you are currently using will not be supported for long. Thank you.

data.body: Hi, it has come to our attention that some of the allotment statuses for the IPO of **Nisus Finance Services Co Limited** were inadvertently displayed as **Not Applied**. Please note that this is a known issue for Skyline IPOs and cannot be solved from our side. You may retry by tapping the **Incorrect? Reload** button from the three-dot menu available on the right side of any allotment or rely on the SMS and email sent to you by the registrar or the exchange as they reflect the true status. Thanks!
data.markdown_body: Hi, it has come to our attention that some of the allotment statuses for the IPO of **Nisus Finance Services Co Limited** were inadvertently displayed as **Not Applied**. Please note that this is a known issue for Skyline IPOs and cannot be solved from our side. You may retry by tapping the **Incorrect? Reload** button from the three-dot menu available on the right side of any allotment or rely on the SMS and email sent to you by the registrar or the exchange as they reflect the true status. Thanks!
